#!/usr/bin/env ruby18 -wKU require "uri" require "#{ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"]}/lib/tm/htmloutput" require "#{ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"]}/lib/tm/markdown"
if [[ -f "$TM_FILEPATH" ]]; then echo "<base href='tm-file://${TM_FILEPATH// /%20}'>" fi
# Convert to html then make one of the html tags above caret # into a link that we scroll down to "${TM_MARKDOWN:-Markdown.pl}"|"${TM_SMARTYPANTS:-SmartyPants.pl}"|ruby -e ' lines = STDIN.read.split("\n") n = [ENV["TM_LINE_NUMBER"].to_i, lines.length].min - 7
while n > 0 && !lines[n].match(/<(h\d|p|ul|li|blockquote|pre|div|img|code|table|tr)>/i) n -= 1 end
if n > 0 && m = lines[n].match(/<(h\d|p|ul|li|blockquote|pre|div|img|code|table|tr)>(.*)$/i) lines[n] = "<#{m[1]} id=\"scroll_to_here\" >#{m[2]}" end
io << lines.join("\n") io << "\n<script>window.location.hash = \"scroll_to_here\";</script>" unless ENV.key?('TM_REFRESH') end
